title: OneDrive: Create with Templates
description: ,We're refreshing the file creation experience in OneDrive for Web which you initiate by clicking the “Add new” button. Soon, clicking the “Add new” button in OneDrive will give you the option to create a blank file or choose from a selection a high-quality, beautifully designed Word, Excel and PowerPoint templates to jumpstart your work. Note: After close evaluation of this rollout, we have decided to discontinue the launch of this new file creation experience and will revert to the previous experience.
